lis=[]
fa,fb,temp=0,0,0
def fib(n,x,y):
	fa,fb=x,y
	i=len(lis)-2
	while(i>=0):
		temp=fb
		fb=(2*fa+fb)*fb
		fa=fa*fa+temp*temp
		if(lis[i]==1):
			temp=fb
			fb=fa+fb
			fa=temp
		i=i-1
	return fb

def main():
    t = input()
    for i in xrange(t):
        a, b, n = map(int, raw_input().split())
        # Testing a naive approach.
        if n==1: print a
        elif n==2: print b
        else:
            for i in xrange(2,n):
                c = a+b
                a = b
                b = c
            print c
main()
